description.displayText:
Angela was fantastic with our two daughters, aged 6 and 2.  She was always on time, communicated very well, and did a great job watching our girls. Our girls loved spending their days with her and were always so excited to see her. We would highly recommend Angela to anyone looking for a great person to watch their children. 

The girls are looking forward to Angela watching them again in the future.
